name: Clear for Slack
description: Clear is a Slack app that helps you write clearer, more direct workplace messages. Privacy-first, no message storage, with built-in coaching to help you improve over time.

name: Community Figma MCP server
tagline: Allow AI Agents to help you with Figma designs!
description: The unofficial Figma Model Context Protocol(MCP) server is a missing link between your AI agent and the Figma design document. Now, AI agents can create, edit, and arrange your Figma design. You can use it together with ChatGPT, Claude Desktop, Cursor, or any other client that supports MCP. The project is free and open source. You don't need anything extra. You use Figma together with your LLM.

name: Griply 2026
tagline: Achieve your goals with a goal-oriented task manager
description: Most goals fail because they never translate into daily action. Griply is a goal-oriented task manager that connects your goals, habits, tasks, and calendar in one easy-to-use system. Plan your goals for 2026, break them down into daily actions, schedule time for what matters, and track measurable progress over time with a planner designed around outcomes, not just tasks.

name: Radial
description: Radial is a modern pie menu for macOS. Create macros that automate repetitive tasks, then trigger them instantly with a single gesture.

name: Blober.io
tagline: The easiest way to transfer files between cloud providers.
description: Manage blobs, files and folders across different storage providers. Blober a local-first workflow engine designed to turn "data graveyards" into organized archives.

name: CalPal
tagline: The notebook calculator that thinks for you (now with AI).
description: Most calculators give you answers but lose the context. CalPal is a literate calculator that combines a text editor with a calculation engine, letting your math tell a story. The standout feature is the BYOK AI Assistant (Gemini). It solves "Blank Page Syndrome"â€”just ask it to "Draft a travel budget" or "Estimate MVP costs," and it generates the line items instantly for you to tweak. It's 100% free, private (local-only data), and browser-based.

name: Supaguard
tagline: Scan, Detect & Protect Your Supabase Data
description: Iâ€™ve seen many Supabase apps accidentally expose PII, PCI, or hardcoded keys. Itâ€™s easy to miss and expensive to fix. So I built Supaguard â€” it scans your app in minutes and shows exactly whatâ€™s exposed. â€¢ No setup, just connect â€¢ Detects PII, PCI & API keys â€¢ Instant alerts Launch offer: 2 free scans + 35% New Year discount ğŸ‘‰ supaguard.pro Feedback welcome â€” built to help devs stay safe without headaches.

name: Timelines 4
tagline: Track your time to achieve your New Year's resolutions.
description: Track your time on an interactive timeline, see where itâ€™s going, and find more time for the things you care about. This is great also for reaching your New Year resolutions. Timelines 4 brings easier management and tracking of subcategories, combined goals, improved Live Activity and Shortcuts integration, and more.
